title: Two of a Kind
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Oh, Miachi. Hey there! ğ…  You have that candy......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah, I bought it yesterday since Rina said it looked interesting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Awesome! Hold on, I got it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wow! You bought it too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yup! Rinari thought it looked good, so I bought it! Letâ€™s go find Rinari and give some to her! ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>How did it end up like this...... Well, I was also thinking of giving the candy to her......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Itâ€™s okay. Letâ€™s both give her candy! ğ…  And weâ€™ll eat it together! I want to eat it with Miachi too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ugh, I guess I have no choice......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yay! Come on, letâ€™s hurry up and find Rinari! Letâ€™s race to the courtyard.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
